inputs.name: go-version-input
inputs.description: Version of Go to use for govulncheck

inputs.name: check-latest
inputs.description: Set this option to true if you want the action to always check for the latest available Go version that satisfies the version spec

inputs.name: cache
inputs.description: Used to specify whether Go caching is needed. Set to true, if you would like to enable caching.

inputs.name: go-package
inputs.description: Go Package to scan with govulncheck

inputs.name: work-dir
inputs.description: Directory in which to run govulncheck

inputs.name: go-version-file
inputs.description: Path to the go.mod or go.work file.

inputs.name: output-file
inputs.description: The file to which the govulncheck output is saved
